channel.title: Static Animation
channel.description:
Hey, ive noticed that my Static Animation, always face south.. Like my dds spec, the animation always goes to the south of the player, not the way they are facing.
Anyone know a fix?
Much apreciated[br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2007, 11:14:21 AM[/size][hr]Come on -.-... 15TH page and still, nothing?
